date.headline: SDRC (Siemens PLM)
date.text: Developed the 3D graphics display capabilities of SDRC’s I-DEAS Mechanical CAD software for numerous workstation platforms and 3D graphics APIs. I worked closely with the 3D workstation manufacturers, such as SGI and Hewlett Packard, to optimize SDRC's products for their platforms.

date.headline: Apple (Claris)
date.text: Worked at Claris, Apple's fully owned software subsidiary at the time, as part of the team that built many of Apple’s desktop graphics applications such as ClarisDraw, the successor to MacDraw. I was responsible for porting ClarisDraw and ClarisImpact from Mac to Windows and developing features specific to the Windows versions.

date.headline: SGI (Silicon Graphics)
date.text: Worked closely with key software vendors optimizing their products for SGI's 3D graphics workstations to help gain SGI an advantage over competitive platforms. Aided in driving the adoption of SGI-backed standards, such as OpenGL, by 3D graphics software vendors.

date.headline: Adobe
date.text: Joined Adobe to become a part of their first team assembled to develop web-based products. I was a Product Architect and Engineering Manager for many projects, such as Photoshop.com.

date.headline: Cardinal Solutions
date.text: Lead consultant for Cardinal's Adobe LiveCycle enterprise service integration team. Worked with clients such as Fidelity Investmentsto to design and develop enterprise integration implementation projects around Adobe's LiveCycle suite of enterprise automation solutions.

date.headline: cintimedia LLC
date.text:
A freelance consulting practice specialzing in...

• Agile-based design and development of enterprise and consumer products for web and mobile
• Architectural design and development of Cloud and SaaS-based solutions for content delivery and consumption across web and mobile platforms
• Technical business analysis
• Big Data visualization and search

date.headline: Hexis Cyber Solutions
date.text: Leading the UX design and development team for a cyber security threat detection and removal solution. The UX enables customer to create and configure reports and interactive dashboards using a wide variety of monitoring and visualization options.
